alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:11PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Sullivan, south central Wayne and Pike Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 111 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Highland Lake to Blooming Grove to near Sterling. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bushkill, Lackawaxen, Blooming Grove, Paupack, Shohola, Matamoras, Sterling, Hawley, Milford and Greentown. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 84 between 17 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
